entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 26. Humidex 30. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
